Cell.Data: text serounded by {} or [] are special tags for code. These tag will be replaced with other text eg: the name of a player. The tags should NOT be localized. They represent the place in the sentens for their replacing string. Some {} tags start with STR or INT. STR means it will be replaced with text, INT means it will be replaced with a numerical value
as in: succeeded to join a network session
as in: failed to join a network session
displayed to the player if the username is already used by another player
displayed to the player if the profile name is already used
displayed to the player if the password given to login is wrong
displayed to the player if the username given to login is not registered
as in: registration key has already been used once and became invalid, ( a combination of letters and numbers )
as in: invalid registration key, ( a combination of letters and numbers )
as in: the email adress is already registered
as in: there was an error on the database of the game
as in: there was a error with the network connection
displayed to the used when the connection to the server failed
displayed to the player when the server is full
displayed to the player when the server is not fully setup yet

{STR_reason} will be replaced with a string for the reason why the user could not setup an account
{STR_reason} will be replaced with a string for the reason why the user could not change his password

The default message sent with an invitation to a lobby when there is no system default
The default message sent with a turn notification (push notification) when there is no system default. Currently this is only implemented on PS4, on which there is no system default.
To access our online service, you need to register your product. Go to your account settings in the launcher to register your key, or visit one of the online stores.
要访问我们的在线服务，你需要对你的产品进行注册。前往启动器“账户设置”注册你的密钥，或访问任一在线商店进行注册。
Displayed next to the button used to open the profile of the host in the session list (previously joined sessions).
Displayed on the button used to open the profile of the currently selected player in the session information dialog.
Displayed on the button used to send an email to the currently selected player in the session information dialog.
正在移除战局- 请稍候
Displayed to the user in a dialog when they have chosen to delete a session from their session list.
Displayed to the user in a system message when there was an error deleting the session.
Could not login: account in use - only offline features are supported!
无法登录：账户使用中- 仅可使用离线功能！
Someone tries to login with one account on 2 systems

Our servers cannot establish a connection to your computer. Please check your firewall and/or manually open ports on your router.[br/]For more information about solving network issues, please visit our website:[br/] www.ageofwonders.com/support/networking/
我们的服务器无法与你的计算机建立连接。请检查你的防火墙和/或手动开启路由器端口。[br/]更多关于网络故障解决方案，敬请访问我的网站：[br/]www.ageofwonders.com/support/networking/
Displayed when network couldn't be configured.
Failed to establish connection to Xbox Live. You need to be connected to Xbox Live to access online features.
未能建立与 Xbox Live 的连接。你需要连接至 Xbox Live，方能使用在线功能。
Message that pops up when a user initiated request ended in a loss of connection. Keep in mind that the official terminology needs to be used.
Failed to establish connection to PlayStation™Network.[br/]You need to be connected to PlayStation™Network to access online features.
与 PlayStation™Network 建立连接失败。[br/]你需要连接至 PlayStation™Network 才能使用在线功能。
Message that pops up when a user initiated request ended in a loss of connection. Keep in mind that the official terminology needs to be used.
Message that pops up when the player has lost connection to Xbox Live. Keep in mind that the official terminology needs to be used.
Message that pops up when the player has lost connection to PlayStation™Network. Keep in mind that the official terminology needs to be used.
游戏房间服务器连接丢失！
Message that pops up when the player has lost connection to the server
You were removed from the session!
Message that pops up when the player was forcibly removed from a multiplayer session. The cause is unspecified.
text above an input field where players can input the name of the network that they are playing on
text above a list of all adapters

Due to poor connectivity, other players cannot join a session hosted by you. This might be caused by a firewall, router or your internet service provider. Please visit the support website for more information on how to solve this issue. You can, however, join other people's games, but please note that the connection might experience some lag when playing with more than two players.
由于网络连接不稳定，其他玩家无法加入你发起的战局。成因可能是你的防火墙、路由器或互联网服务提供商故障。请访问支持网站，获取更更多该问题解决方案信息。你也可以加入他人发起的游戏，但请留意，在与两个及以上玩家进行游戏时，可能会出现连接延迟问题。

Due to moderate connectivity, other players might not be able to connect to you reliably. This is most likely caused by your router. Please visit the support website for more information on how to solve this issue. Also note that, with this connectivity quality, you might experience some lag when playing with more than two players.
由于网络连接稳定性一般，其它玩家或无法稳定连接到你的游戏房间。这个问题最有可能出自你的路由器。请访问支持网站获取更多该问题解决方案。另请留意，在当前网络连接状态下，若你与两位及以上玩家进行游戏，可能会出现一些延迟。
As in connection to the internet
Your connection is open and other players should be able to connect to you.
你的连接处于开放状态，其他玩家可与你建立连接。
The session is hosted with a different version of the game than you are running. Note: this will also happen if one of the players is running the game in debug mode.
该战局主机的游戏版本与你当前所运行游戏版本不同。请注意：若某位玩家在故障排除模式下运行游戏，也会出现相同问题。
Message that pops up when the player has lost connection to the server
{STR_Icon} Direct Connection: the data for this connection is being sent directly to the user.
{STR_Icon}直接连接：连接数据直接发送至用户。
{STR_Icon} User Relay: the data for this connection is being relayed through another user.
{STR_Icon}用户中继：连接数据通过其它用户中继。
{STR_Icon} Server Relay: the data for this connection is being relayed through a server.
{STR_Icon}服务器中继：连接数据通过服务器中继。
Please check your email inbox to continue resetting your password.
请检查你的电子邮箱收件箱，以继续密码重置操作。
Are you sure you want to exit this session?
Asked to the player if they want to exit the session that they are currently in
Displayed as a warning to the player when they press the refresh button and it is currently disabled.
as in: user abandoned (will never comeback) the network game
Uploading session, when completed you may rejoin…
正在上传战局。完成后可重新加入…
Displayed to the user in the busy screen to let them know what is going to happen after pressing the play/upload button.
Repairing the session might result in loss of previous actions. All players will be notified of this action via email![br/][br/]Are you sure that you want to repair the session?
修复战局可能会导致失去之前的操作。进行过此操作的消息将通过电子邮件通知给所有玩家！[br/][br/]是否确定修复战局？
Repairing the session might result in loss of previous actions. All players will be notified of this action![br/][br/]Are you sure that you want to repair the session?
修复战局可能会导致丢失之前的操作。进行过此操作的消息将通知给所有玩家！[br/][br/]是否确定修复战局？
Repairing the session might result in loss of previous actions.[br/][br/]Are you sure that you want to repair the session?
修复战局可能会导致丢失之前的操作。[br/][br/]是否确定修复战局？
{STR_username} repaired the turn, progress might be lost.
{STR_username}修复了回合，进度可能已经丢失。
Translated using Google Translate on July 4th 2019, please update
Translated using Google Translate on July 4th 2019, please update
Failed to communicate with the UDP relay; your multiplayer experience may be limited. Please check your NAT configuration if this keeps occurring.
无法与 UDP 中继通信；你的多人游戏体验可能会受到限制。如果持续出现这种情况，请检查你的 NAT 配置。
Warning: Paradox account activation is recommended! Please check your email inbox to activate your account.
警告：建议激活 Paradox 账户！请查看你的电子邮件收件箱来激活账户。
Kick in the sense of forcefully removing someone from a multiplayer session due to bad behavior.
You are about to kick {STR_Username} from the session. They will be replaced by AI. Do you want to continue?
你即将把{STR_Username}踢出战局，该玩家将由电脑玩家代替。是否继续？
You were kicked from the session!
正在踢出用户 - 请稍候
无法踢出用户 - 原因未知
An error has occurred: kicked from the session
出现错误：已被移出战局
An error has occurred: kicked from the session. Kicked in the sense of being removed forcefully from a multiplayer session due to bad behavior.
